entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
